about-text-one: I am currently studying a two year program at Medieinstitutet in Gothenburg and aspiring to get to work as a Front End Developer in the coming years. I have had a genuine interest for web development for almost a decade now and I am very eager to get to put all of my passion into practice and start to learn all the ins and outs that comes with the territory. I have a strong drive to learn and experience new things.
about-text-two: I aspire to be up to date and familiar with the most frequently occuring frameworks such as React, Angular & Vue in order to be able to adapt and adjust accordingly.
skills-description-two: Working with interface design in Figma
portfolio-description-header: Here are a couple of group projects that I have had the pleasure of working on along with fellow students from Medieinstitutet
portfolio-bumpy-description-one: Bumpy Monster was created for an assignment by myself and five other students where we used p5.js, TypeScript and worked with OOP.
portfolio-bumpy-description-two: Learn more about the game or try it out by checking it out on GitHub or play the demo by clicking the links below
portfolio-GHEDb-description-one: GHEDb was created for an assignment by myself and two other students where we used React, Typescript, worked with an API and used Styled-Components.
portfolio-GHEDb-description-two: Learn more about the site or browse it for yourself by checking it out on GitHub or view the demo by clicking the links below
contact-text: If you would like to get in touch with me or learn more about me you can visit my LinkedIn page or send me an email by clicking the icons below. Additionally, if you are curious about more of my previous projects and want to know what I am currently working on you can also visit my GitHub page.
